title: Watchtower
description:
The redesigned Watchtower is a wide, directional, classic camber shape with a medium to stiff flex; an advanced all-mountain bomber that’s built wide to support larger feet, yet designed to provide the quickness of a narrower board; the Watchtower provides the versatility needed to slash the steeps, cruise the trees, and punch through big pow turns.
To learn more about the Watchtower visit: arborcollective.com/snow/boards/view/40/watchtower
